title: Lenox Butterfly Meadow 10-Piece Ornament Set, 0.45 LB, Multi
features: Includes (10) assorted ornaments: (4) butterflies, a dragonfly, a bee, a ladybug on a leaf, and (3) flowers
description: Butterflies, bouquets, and bees, oh my] Masterfully crafted of hand-painted ivory porcelain, our Butterfly Meadow 10-Piece Ornament Set includes lively and lovely creatures from the beloved Butterfly Meadow pattern. Among them are butterflies, flowers, a bee, a ladybug on a leaf, a dragonfly, and more] Add them to your ornament tree (or use them in any way you wish) for a pretty spring and summer scene.At Lenox, we strive to make the daily moments in your life a bit more special. Inspired by heritage and designed for now, we bring a rich history of craftsmanship to modern day life. We’ve been a part of homes for over 130 years. Each time you buy Lenox, you are buying a versatile and timeless piece crafted with our century-long commitment to quality, artistry and beauty. Whether you’re gathering the family for dinner, grabbing a midnight snack for yourself in front of the TV or having friends over, Lenox is for real moments that last on products that are meant for living.
